fields.name: Democracy Club
fields.description: This is the Democracy Club "project" for collectings DC tasks in one place

fields.name: The Straight Choice
fields.description: The Straight Choice is a project to collect election leaflets and materials

fields.name: Invite Three Friends
fields.description: Invite more people to join.  It will really help. What you can do is have a look of the list of places where we don't have anyone.  That would be especially helpful.  Thanks.

fields.name: Upload Leaflet
fields.description: If you get any election leaflets posted through your door, please take a photo of them and upload them to the Straight Choice website.  You can find out more about this project on their website.

fields.name: Describe Local Issues
fields.description: Add a local issue to your constituency page.  Eventually we'll use local issues as a basis to ask your candidates questions and hold them to their answers.
